topic.title: Appendix B Amendments to other IFRSs

note.p: The amendments in this appendix shall be applied for annual periods beginning on or after 1Â January 2009. If an entity applies this IFRS for an earlier period, these amendments shall be applied for that earlier period. In the amended paragraphs, new text is underlined and deleted text is struck through.

p.i: The amendments contained in this appendix when this IFRS was issued in 2006 have been incorporated into the text of the relevant IFRSs in this volume.
